video.title: The Slap
video.synopsis: Based on a best-selling novel, this miniseries explores the repercussions on family and friends when a man publicly slaps a boy who is not his son.

episodes.synopsis: Hector's birthday barbecue comes to an abrupt end after a parent gets aggressive -- an act that severely divides the group of family and friends.
episodes.title: Hector

episodes.synopsis: Appalled by what she has witnessed, Anouk juggles numerous stressful situations, but there is one surprise that tips her over the edge.
episodes.title: Anouk

episodes.synopsis: Harry leads a privileged life, but what occurred at the barbecue threatens to change everything, and he struggles to take control of his anger.
episodes.title: Harry

episodes.synopsis: Though Hector broke off his relationship with Connie, her feelings for him have only gotten stronger. Rejected, she blurts out a lie.
episodes.title: Connie

episodes.synopsis: After receiving notice of the court date, Rosie is relieved that Harry may be punished. But soon she realizes that she has little support.
episodes.title: Rosie

episodes.synopsis: Manolis feels powerless as he struggles to hold his family together. Troubled marriages only worsen the situation.
episodes.title: Manolis

episodes.synopsis: The court case is over, but Aisha is still reeling from the drama. Relief comes in the form of a work conference, where she meets a charming stranger.
episodes.title: Aisha

episodes.synopsis: Keeping Connie's secret is causing Richie a great deal of anxiety, and he pleads with her to tell the police about Hector.
episodes.title: Richie
